Recipe.Name: Vegetable Lo Mein
Recipe.Description: Egg noodles that are stir-fried together with vegetables.

Directions.Paragraph: Slice the carrots in a food processor and set aside. Slice about 4 oz of cabbage very thin and set aside.
In a small glass dish, mix the hoisin sauce, soy sauce, rice wine and sesame oil. Set aside.

Heat the vegetable oil in a wok on high heat. Add the vegetables and stir-fry for about 2 minutes. Push the vegetables aside in the wok, making room at the bottom of the wok for the sauce. Pour in the sauce mixture and allow it to start bubbling. Start folding the vegetables into the sauce and continue stir-frying for about 3 more minutes.
Add the noodles to the wok and continue stir-frying for another 2 - 3 minutes.
